spyod de// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod pas/ mi dmulegs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de// rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
sams baspyod pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par mas bskyed pas// mi dmab/sa pa'i tshul gyis/
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha lo la tu phyin pa la spyod de// rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mdamigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la sdod de/ dko'u shika gzhan yang gang khrag byang chub sems dpa' sems
pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed bsam mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen stobs lnga sgomamo// rnam pa thams ngami
dga' chen pani/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis napa nye bar gzhug pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thon//
[B/ ]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sams bskyed pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ yang dag par phreng ba bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyan ba nyidi dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed bas/ midamib sa/
pa'i tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams car mkhyen panyid dang ldan pat+tisams bskyod pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi// dbang po lnga sgom mo// rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod pas/ mi dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis/ stobs lta sgomamo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyanab nyid dang ldan pa'i sams spyod pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas// mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la sgom
mo rnam pa thams car mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dmigs nga 'tshul gyis/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
dang ldan pa'i sa/mas bskyed pas/ mi rigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyad pas/ ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis//
mthar gyis gnas nga 'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngagu sgomamo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ra ba sems bskyed pas// mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/
mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sa/mas bskyed pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis// mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo// rnam pathams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgomamo// rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis/ gzus kyi sgo rnams sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ngaskyod pas da ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pat+ti sams bskyad pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgomamo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom ma// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis//
zha byams pachan po sgom go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sams bskyed pas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po sgom mo// rnam pa grams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i sams bskyed pa nas// mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom mo// ko'u shaka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/
rab kyi parol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar so so yang dag par slob sta/ 'di ltar chos rnams mngon par rlan par byed pa dang/ yongs su rlon par byed pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs par
byed pa dang/ yongs su rgyug par byed pa dang/ yongs su dpyod par byed pa de dugani chos khe nar brad de/ rda la bdag gam bdag gi med de// da ci'i phyir zhan/ de na'ar ltar byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' tshan po yodas su bsngo ba'i sams gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de yang yongs su bsdol 'i sems dang
'grogs pa ma yin/ kol ka yongs su bsngo ba'i sams gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi samasal mdacing mi dmigs// byang chub kyi sems gsan pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba'i so ma/
la med cing mi dmigs te/ ko'u shika gang da ltar chos thams cad la yang ra da tu rtogal/ sa gang la yang rnam par rgyu ba mad pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab
kyi pa'o tu phyin pa// de skad ces smas pa dang/ lce'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad kyis smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na longs su bsngo ba'i sems kyang
chub kyi sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin/ ji ltar na byang chub kyis/gas yongs su bsdo ba'i soms dang 'grogs pa ma yin/ ji ltar nayongs su bsngo ba'i sems byang chub kyi sams la mdaci'i
mi dmigs/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi sog mag yongs su bsngo ba 'a sems la med cing mi dmigs/ rab 'byor gyis smas pa/ ko'u shi ka yongs su bsdoba'i sems gang yin pa dran sems/
ma yin/ byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de yang sams ma yin te/ da ltar nas mas ma yin pa gang yin pa da ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa dan sams/
ma yin pa ste sams chu yin pa da ni sams ma yin par yongs su bsngo bamad/ bsam gyisami khyab pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su bsngo ba mad do/ de ltar na sams ma yin pa
gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de ni sems ma yin pa ste/ ko'u shi ka 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen pa'i shes rab kyi pha
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshed ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor khyod da ltar byang chub sems dpa=
sams dpa' chon po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing mos pa skyed palegs so legs so// rab 'byor legs so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
bdag gis ni bka' drin dran par bgyi ste/ bka' drin mi dran par mi bgyi'o// de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
bzhugs pa'i tsho/ de'i tshanyan thos de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa
drug la gdams pa dang/ rjes su bstan par bgyi ste/ dgyas pa dang// yang dag par bskul ba dang/ legs par gzangs bstod pa dang/ rab tu dgyes pa dang/ gzhag
pa dang/ shin tu brtan pa bgyis pas/ sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ parol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par mdzad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla namad pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gdams/
0/par bgyi 'o// rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// dga' bar bgyi'o// yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o// legs par gzangs bstod par bgyi// long tu dbab par bgyi'o// dgod par bgyi/
shin tu brtan par bgyi'o// bdag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa rol tu phyin pa drug la de ltar gdams pa dang/ rjes su bstan pa dang/ dga' bar bgyis pa dang/
yang dag par bskul bdar/ legs par gzengs bstod pa dang/ rab tu dga' bar bgyis pa dang/ bkod pa dang/ shin tu brtan pa dag kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'phyor gyis// lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka pa'i phyir shin tu legs
par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba dang/ ji ltar mi gnas par bya ba bdag gis bshad do/ ko'ug ka
gzugs ni gzugs kyis stongang// tshor ba'atsho bas stong ngo// 'du shesani 'du shes kyis stod// 'du byungan 'du byed kyis stong ngo// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo// byang/
chub sems dapa'i n byang chub sems dpas stong ngo/ dko'u shi ka da ltar na gzugs stong pa nyidadang/ tshor ba stong panyid dang/ 'du shes stong pa nyid dang/ 'du byed stong ba nyid dang/ rnam par
na da/ shes pa stong pa nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su mad cing gnyis su bya med de/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpalas mas dpa' chen pog/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o/ ko'u shi ka gzhan yang mig nama'i gis stong de/ nab ni rna ngas stong ngo// snani snas stong ngo// sbyin rtsis stong ngo// lus ni lus kyis

stong ngo// yang na yid kyis stong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo/ ko'u shi ka da ltar na mig stong pa nyid dang rna ba stong pa nyidi dang snastong pa nyid dang/ lce stong
pa nyid dang/ lus stong pa nyid dang/ yid stong pa nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// ko'u ka gzhan yang gajugs ni gzugs kyis/

stong ngo// sgron sgras stong ngo// drin dris stong ngo// 'onaros stong ngo// rag na rig gis stong ngo// chos n ris kyis stong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sem dang/sa stor nga// ko'u shi ka de ltar
na gzugs stong pa nyid dang/ sgra stong pa nyid dang/ ji stong pa nyid dang/ ro stong pa nyid dang/ rig sho pa nyid dang/ chos stong ba nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa 'di la gnyis su med

cingaganyis su zhed/dko'u shi ka gzhan yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo// rnaba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stongango// sna'i rnam par shes pa nasna'i

rnam pa rags pas stongang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nalce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo// lus kyi rnam par bashas pan lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa na yid kyi rnam pa shes

bas stong ngo/ byang chub sems dpa' na byang chub sems dpas stong ngo/ dko'u shi ka de ltar na mig gi rnam par shar pa stong pa nyid dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang/ sna'i rnam par bshes

pa stong pa nyid dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang/ lus kyi rnam pa ra shas ra stong pa nyid dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong nga nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid de la gnyis
su med cing gnyis su byas med do// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo// rab 'dus te rig pa ni rna ba'i'adus te re ba pas stong ngo// sna'i 'dus te reb/

ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo// lci'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te
rag pas stong ngo// byang chub sems dbang ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo// ko'u shaka daltar namag gi 'dus ta rig pa stong pa nyid dang/ rna pa'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang/ sna'i 'dus te

rig pa stong pa nyid dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis/
sumed cing gnyis su byar med de/ ko'u shika gzhan ya dmig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong nga go/ ba'i 'dug

te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo// lci'i 'dus te

te reg pa las byung ba'itshor ba na spyi'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher bas stong ngo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo// yod kyi
'dus te reg pa los byung ba'atsher pa ni yid kyi 'dus reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' na byang chub sems dpas stong ngo/ dko'u shi ka de ltar n mig gi 'dus te reg pa

las byung ba'i tshor ba stong pa nyid dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg palaMs byung ba'i tshor ba stong pa nyid dad sna'i 'dus rta rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong pa nyid dang/ lce'i dus te reg pa las byung

ba'i tshor ba stong pa nyid dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg palas byung ba'i tshor ba stong pa nyid dang 1 yid kyi 'dus te'i ga pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong pa nyidi dang 1 byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid do/
la gnyis su mad cing gnyis su byar med de/ ko'u chog byang tshub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang sa'i khams

ni sa'i khams kyis stod de/ dachu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ngo// ma'i khams ni ma'i khams kyis stong ngo// rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ngo// nam ma kha'i khams ni nam mkha'i//
khams kyis stong ngo// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo// ko'u shi ka de ltar na sa'i khams stong pa
nyid dang/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang/ ma'i khams stong pa nyid dang/ rlung gakhams stong pa nyid dang/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang/
byang chub sems dpa' stong panyid de la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byur mad de/ ke'u sha ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o//
ko'u shi ka gzhan yang marig pa ni ma rigs pas stong ngo// 'du byed na 'du byed kyis stong ngo// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo// ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong ngo/
sku mchod drugani spyi mchod drug gis stong ngo/ rig pa ni rig pas stong ngo// tshor ba ni tsher bas stong ngo// srid pa ni sradabs stong ngo// len ba ni len pas stong ngo// srid pa ni srid pas
stong ngo// skyo ba na skyob stod da// rga shin shis stong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub shadapas stong ngo/ dko'u shi ka de ltar na ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang 'du byed stong pa nyid
@#// dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang/ ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid dar/ skya mched drug stong pa nyid dang/ reg pa stong pa nyid dang/ tsho ba stong pa nyid dang/ srad/

pa stong ba nyid dang/ len pa stong pa nyid dang/ srid pa stong pa nyid dang// skye ba stong pa nyid dang/ rgashi stong pa nyid dang// byang chub sems dor tAstong pa nyid de la gnyis su med cing gnyis su

byar med de/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar ba/nas par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i phal

tu phyin pas stong de// tshul khrims kyi pa rol tu phyin panaMtshul khrims kyi par rolatu phyin pas stong ngo/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgrod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo// brtson 'grus kyi sa

rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa stong ngo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyan ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pas stong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo// ko'u shi kade ltar n sbyin pa'i parol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang/

bzod pa'i kha 'ol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong panyidi dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stongapanyidang/

byang chub sems dang 'a stong pa nyid du la gnyis su med cing ga nyis su byar med de/ ko'u shi ka khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pawadaltar gnas par bya'o/ ke'u/

shaka gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid na nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stongang// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid na stong pa nyid stong

pa nyid kyis stong ngo// chen po stong pa nyidi na chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ don dag pa stong pa nyidin na ma pa stong pa nyid kyis stang ngod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong

ngodo 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyiden mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo// thog mdang tha mamad ba stong pa nyidan thog ma

dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong// chos thams cad stong

pa nyidi na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stongado/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nam de mgas pa stong pa nyid kyis stod go/

dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni da ngos po mang ba stong ra 'di kyis stong ngo// ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidi kyis stong ngo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bodi
kyis stod de// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sesams dbas stong da/ kazhushi ka de ltar nanang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ phyin ng

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen ng stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong panyid stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid stong ba nyid dar/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong panyid stong pa nyid dang/ dor bamed pa stong pa nyid stongal 'dedang/ rang bzhin stod

slob nyid stong pa nyidi dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ midamigs pa stong pa nyid stod pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stod pa

nyid stong pa nyid dang/ ngo banyidi stong pa nyid stong panyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ byungachung sams dba' stong ba nyid de la gnyis su mang tsang gnyis su phyir mad de/

ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o/ ko'u sha ka ga zhaya dran pa 'u bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag ra rnams kyis/

stong ngo// yang dag par sbyong ba rnams niyang dag par sdong ba rnams kyis stong ngo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo// dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong
ngo stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ngo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo// 'phags pa 'a'i ma yan lag brgyad pa na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pas stong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo// ko'u shi kA de ltar dadran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid dang/ yang dag par slong ba stong pa nyid dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa stong pa nyid dang/ dbang po stong pa nyid dang/ stobs stong pa nyid dang/ phyang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid dang/ byang chub sems
dpa 'a stong pa nyid du la bganyis su mdu cing gnyis su byur mdad/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o/ dko'u shike gzhan
mang ba phag sa pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo// bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo// tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo//
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ra rnams n gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo// rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo// mthar kyi gdan/
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nimathar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma mad pa dang/ smon pa med pa ni rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med ngad dang smon pa med pas stong ngo/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo// ting nge 'dzin
rnams n ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo// de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs rnams na de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs rnams kyis stodad/
mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni de sAya yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas/

kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong du// byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo// go'ashika de ltar na 'phags pa'i ba dan pa stong pa nyid dang/ bsam pa de rten stong pa nyid dar/ tshad
! med pa stong panyid dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang/ rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i nyams par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang/ rnam par
thur pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pamadapa stong pa nyid dang/ mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang/ ti nga nga 'dzin sbyod pa nyid dang/ gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid dad
da bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang/ mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyide dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nying dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dar/ byang chub
sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su mda' de ga nyis su byar med de/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posangashas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas bar bya'o// kobushi ka

gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi thag pas stongang// rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo// byang

chub sems dpa' na byang chub sems dpas stong ngo// ko'usha kade ltar na nyan thos kyi thug pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa stong pa nyid dang/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa stong pa nyid dang/

byang chub sems dang/ 'a stong pa nyid du 'du gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o// ko'u
shaka gzhan yang nyan thos nyan thos kyis stong do/ rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ngo// sangs rgyas ni sangs kyis stong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems da pas stong ngo/

ko'u shi ka da ltar n nyan thos stong pa nyid dang/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang/ sa rgyas stong pa nyid dang de byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de/ ke'u
gi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pald ltar gnas par bya'o// ko'u ka gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus
stong ngo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nan cig phyir 'ong ba'i khrus bus stong ngo/ bu'i ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo// dgra bcom pa nyidi ni/

dgru bzhi la nyid kyi sa stong ngo// bad byang chub 'ing byab chub kyis stong ngo// lam gyi rnam pa sa pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad/

mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' n byang chub sems dpas stong ngo// ko'u shi ka de ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid dang/ lanacig phyir 'od pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid dang/

rtsa phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stod pa nyidadad/ dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub stong pa nyid dang/ lam gyi rnam bshas pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyid stod pa
nyid dang/ byang nub soms dnga' stod bdadalaganyis sumad cing gnyis sur+yaramed de/ ko'u shi ka khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rgyan pas sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas par
